edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.beans

? MessageBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.beans.MessageBean

  • public class MessageBean
extends java.lang.Object
    A bean for storing data about a message from one user to another. A bean's purpose is to store data. Period. Little or no functionality is to be added to a bean (with the exception of minor formatting such as concatenating phone numbers together). A bean must only have Getters and Setters (Eclipse Hint: Use Source > Generate Getters and Setters? to create these easily)
